sen.j: くいな橋駅（くいなばしえき）は、京都府京都市伏見区にある、京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in the Fushimi Ward of Kyoto City, Kuinabashi Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, a Kyoto Municipal Subway Line.
Located in the Fushimi ward of Kyoto City, Kuinabashi Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, a Kyoto Municipal Subway Line.
Kuinabashi Station, located in the Fushimi Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.
sen.cmt: Kyoto Prefecture追加"Fushimi ward"→"Fushimi Ward"に変更しました。

sen.j: 京都駅以南が開業する際、延長区間で唯一駅名の公募が行われ、近くを流れる鴨川 (淀川水系)にかかる「水鶏橋」（くいなばし）にちなんで駅名が決まった（クイナは鳥の一種）。
sen.e: This is the only station on the section extended south of Kyoto Station for which public participation was invited for its name prior to inauguration and named after 「Kuina-bashi Bridge」 (kuina is a kind of water bird) spanning Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River water system.)

This is the only station on the section extending south of Kyoto Station for which public participation was invited for its name prior to inauguration, whereupon it was named after the Kuina-bashi Bridge) (kuina is a kind of water bird) spanning the Kamogawa River (Yodogawa River water system).

This is the only station on the section extending south of Kyoto Station for which public participation was invited for its name prior to inauguration, whereupon it was named after the 'Kuina-bashi Bridge' (a kuina is a species of water bird) spanning the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system).

sen.j: 駅番号はK14。
sen.e: Station number is K14.
The station number is K14.
The station number is K14.

sen.j: プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: It is an underground station with a single platform between double tracks.
It is an underground station with a single platform between double tracks.
It is an underground station with a single platform between double tracks.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Ticket gates are installed at only one place.
Ticket gates are installed in only one location.
Ticket gates are installed in only one location.

sen.j: 龍谷大学深草学舎
sen.e: Ryukoku University Fukakusa Campus
Ryukoku University Fukakusa Campus
Ryukoku University Fukakusa Campus

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)
sen.e: Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River water system)
Kamogawa River (Yodogawa River water system)
Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system)

sen.j: 竹田車庫
sen.e: Takeda Shako depot
Takeda Shako depot
Takeda Shako train depot
sen.cmt: train depot追加しました（定訳は不明）。

sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Highway Route No.201, Nakayama Inari Road
Kyoto Prefectural Highway Route No. 201, Nakayama Inari Road
Nakayama-Inari Line of the Kyoto Prefectural Route 201
sen.cmt: highwayは削除して既出箇所と統一

sen.j: くいな橋駅には現在、バス路線は乗り入れていない。
sen.e: No bus routes currently operate out of Kuinabashi Station
Currently, there is no bus route operating out of Kuinabashi Station
Currently, there is no bus route operating out of Kuinabashi Station.

sen.j: 最寄バス停：京都市交通局竹田久保町
sen.e: Nearest bus stop: Kyoto Municipal Traffic Bureau Takeda Kubo-cho
Nearest bus stop: Kyoto Municipal Traffic Bureau Takeda Kubo-cho
Nearest bus stop: Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau Takeda Kubo-cho

sen.j: 1988年6月11日 烏丸線京都～竹田間延伸時に開業。
sen.e: Opened on June 11, 1988 when the extended Kyoto Station-Takeda Station section on the Karasuma Line commenced operations.
It opened on June 11, 1988 when the extended Kyoto Station-Takeda Station section of the Karasuma Line commenced operations.
June 11, 1988: The station opened concurrently with the extension of the Karasuma Line between Kyoto Station and Takeda Station.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: Use of PiTaPa Cards started April 1, 2007.
Use of PiTaPa Cards started April 1, 2007.
April 1, 2007: The use of PiTaPa Cards commenced.
